Articles.Content:
I play on Xbox and about a week ago my copy of ksp stopped working. The problem is with the start menu.

When the game has loaded the "start game" button is not selected in white as it used to be. This means I cannot play the game as I can't even select the start game button.

How many games do you have going? Is your "Delete Game" button still active? Are you willing to take a very short break from KSP on your xbox -- since the new version is just about to come out and it fixes that problem?

6 hours ago, bewing said:

How many games do you have going? Is your "Delete Game" button still active? Are you willing to take a very short break from KSP on your xbox -- since the new version is just about to come out and it fixes that problem?

 

so im not the only one with this issue?

also I have already uninstalled and re installed and it had no effect on the issue. therefore I have no game saves left on the game.

Squad released a bad version of KSP before it was thoroughly tested.

You'll just have to wait it out while squad takes their time.
